Subject: Ryan rumor... Date: 15 Apr 93 22:58:12 GMT Article-I.D.: cs1.texdude.734914692 Lines: 12
This just in...
Nolan Ryan hurt his right knee in the 4th inning of the Rangers-Orioles game last night. He'll be having arthoscopic surgery that will, at best, keep him on the DL for two to five weeks.
Just when I had almost convinced myself that the Rangers' rotation would stay healthy this year...
Phil Allen texdude@cs1.bradley.edu
